Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Sheridan/Lawrence
ShortDescription: Northbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Lawrence, Marine Dr., Foster, then resume their normal route on Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Lawrence, Marine Dr., Foster, then resume their normal route on Sheridan, due to street blockage near Sheridan/Lawrence.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near the Library. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near the Library. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
